title: TV Network Conversations, A-Keys and Regina Hall, White House Fast Food, Birthday, Steve Perry, Money Talk, Kells, Drizzy, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: TV Network Conversations, A-Keys and Regina Hall, White House Fast Food, Birthday, Steve Perry, Money Talk, Kells, Drizzy, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Today is straight talk, no chaser.  The fellas discuss their plans if they owned their own TV Network.  Alicia Keys will host the 61st Grammy Awards.  Regina Hall will be honored by Essence.  President Trump spends $5500 on The Fast Food Feast for The National Champion Clemson Football Team.  Uncle Steve tells us how he would like his birthday celebration to go down.  Dr. Steve Perry stops by to talk about his new show on Fox.  The CEO is grateful to not have money problems but tells us some funny stories when he didn't have much.  American Idol and The Voice have removed R. Kelly's music.  Drake will take over Las Vegas with a new residency.  Closing Remarks today are done by Fool #1 and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
